system.description: Any nongood creature within the area that hears the holy word suffers cumulative effects by HD: equal to caster level — deafened (1d4 rounds); up to caster level -1 — blinded (2d4 rounds), deafened; up to caster level -5 — paralyzed (1d10 min.), blinded, deafened; up to caster level -10 — killed (living die, undead destroyed), paralyzed, blinded, deafened. No save. On your home plane, nongood extraplanar creatures are banished (Will -4 negates); banished creatures cannot return for 24 hours. Creatures with HD exceeding your caster level are unaffected.
system.target: Nongood creatures in 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
system.savingThrow: None or Will negates; see text
